title: View Transition
description: CSS View Transitions API utilities for smooth page navigation animations. Progressive enhancement: unsupported browsers work normally.

sections.title: Enable transitions
sections.description: Add .ui-view-transition to <html> to opt-in to cross-document transitions.

sections.title: Named elements
sections.description: Elements with view-transition-name persist across page navigations. The sidebar stays static while content crossfades.

sections.title: Disable for element
sections.description: Exclude an element from view transitions.

examples.code: This element won't participate in transitions
